alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 10:18PM CST until February 21 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Buena Vista County. * WHEN...From noon to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will become possible Monday night into Tuesday, with accumulations of an inch or two possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
